name: financial-adviser-app
description: Financial Adviser Local Application - Personal Financial Management Tool

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:backend:parallel: cd backend && poetry run pytest -n auto --tb=short --disable-warnings
scripts.test:backend:unit: cd backend && poetry run pytest -m 'not slow' --tb=short
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort . && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:backend && npm run fix:frontend
scripts.fix:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort . && poetry run ruff check . --fix
scripts.fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.quality:all: npm run lint:all && npm run type-check:all
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migration: cd backend && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && rm -f database/financial_adviser.db && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run setup
